title: Roast peppered beef with bourbon mustard and all the trimmings
description: James Martin’s gorgeous roast beef recipe with homemade mustard takes Sunday lunch to another level.
ingredients: 1 x 4kg/8¾lb three-bone fore-rib of beef, preferably aged for up to 28 days
salt and freshly ground black pepper
10 floury potatoes, such as King Edward, peeled and cut into large pieces
50g/1¾oz lard, beef dripping or vegetable oil
